ej,luccf801,M,froeb901,Interference call ej,myatg102,C,froeb901,Interference call $Tim McCarver called for interference to complete double play; Phillies Manager Frank Lucchesi and Coach George Myatt ejected by 2B umpire Bruce Froemming
Tim McCarver left with unknown injury

ej,hiatj101,P,pryop901,Fighting ej,craww101,P,pryop901,Fighting $Dodgers Crawford and Astros Hiatt ejected by HP umpire Pryor for fighting; the fourth pitch by to Crawford was well inside; Crawford walked towards the mound and catcher Hiatt ran out beside Crawford; the two exchanged words and Crawford threw his left arm at Hiatt; Hiatt landed two punches and Crawford retaliated with a right; both benches cleared; the brawl lasted about two minutes; Hiatt suffered a bruised shin and a cut on his right ankle from being spiked; Crawford suffered swollen lips;
$Larry Yount injured warming up; this is his entire big league career; Debut game for Larry Yount
